spell_tooltip.description: Encircle enemy players with Bonds of Fel. If any affected player leaves the 8 yd radius they explode, dealing 837,251 Fire damage split amongst all nearby enemies.
Chaos Bolt creates a 5 yd wide eruption of Felfire under the target, reducing movement speed by 50% and reducing all healing received by 25% on all enemies within the fissure. Lasts 6 sec.

Fracture the soul of up to 3 target players within 20 yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by 25% and healing received by 25% for 8 sec. Souls are fractured up to 20 yds from the player's location.

Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 246,195 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Immolate damage increased by 40%.
Incinerate damage increased by 20%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 250,585 Fire damage.

Reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate or Chaos Bolt by 30% for 10 sec.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by 30%. Maximum 2 charges.

Calls down a rain of hellfire the target location, dealing 397,917 Fire damage over 6.7 sec to enemies in the area.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Conflagrate increases your Soul Fire, Channel Demonfire, Immolate, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by 25% for 8 sec.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 424,246 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.

Blasts a target for 284,880 Shadowflame damage, gaining 50% critical strike chance on targets that have 20% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.
Launches 17 bolts of felfire over 1.6 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 61,156 Fire damage to the target and 29,749 Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 60,915 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 60,527 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.7 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 15 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 565,895 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.

Casting Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. If Diabolic Ritual is already active, its duration is reduced by 1 sec instead.

When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 524,118 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 2 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Infernal is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 7% increased damage from your single target spells.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1.7 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 1 Diabolic Imp.

Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance and is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 59,685 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 60,603 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.7 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
While your initial Infernal is active, every Soul Shard you spend has a 15% chance to summon an additional Infernal that lasts 8 sec.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 15 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 564,216 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
Fire damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 4% and your Fire spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.

Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells will further corrupt enemies affected by your Wither, increasing its stack count by 1.

Each time Wither gains a stack it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 137,070 Shadowflame damage to its host until 1 stack remains.
Shadow damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 4% and your Shadow spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.

Curse of Weakness is empowered and transforms into Curse of the Satyr.

 Curse of the Satyr
Increases the time between an enemy's attacks by 20% and the casting time of all spells by 30% for 2 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.
Wither damage increased 20%. When Wither gains a stack from Blackened Soul, it has a chance to gain an additional stack.
Sacrifice 10% of your maximum health. Soul Leech now absorbs an additional 15% of your maximum health.

Wither damage increased by 25%.

Blackened Soul deals 2% increased damage per stack of Wither.

After Wither reaches 8 stacks or when its host reaches 20% health, Wither deals 137,070 Shadowflame damage to its host every 1 sec until 1 stack remains.

When Blackened Soul deals damage, you have a chance to gain 2 stacks of Flashpoint.

Critical strike damage dealt by Wither is increased by 10%. 

Wither has a chance to gain a stack when it critically strikes. Stacks gained this way do not activate Blackened Soul.

Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 381,427 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Increases your armor by 90%.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Consuming Soul Shards increases your Mastery by 0.5% for 10 sec for each shard spent. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 249,050 Fire damage.

Reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate or Chaos Bolt by 30% for 10 sec.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by 30%. Maximum 2 charges.

Calls down a rain of hellfire the target location, dealing 397,917 Fire damage over 6.7 sec to enemies in the area.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Conflagrate increases your Soul Fire, Channel Demonfire, Immolate, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by 25% for 8 sec.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 425,833 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.

Blasts a target for 283,678 Shadowflame damage, gaining 50% critical strike chance on targets that have 20% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.
Launches 17 bolts of felfire over 1.6 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 61,700 Fire damage to the target and 29,896 Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 59,538 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 59,769 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.7 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 15 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 567,460 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 524,118 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 2 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Infernal is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 7% increased damage from your single target spells.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1.7 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 1 Diabolic Imp.

Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance and is reduced beyond 8 targets.
